location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Map accompanying Military Report on Persia Vol. I’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 520 x 370 mm, on sheet 595 x 415 mm.Materials: Printed on paper.

mods.abstract: The key to the map indicates: roads actually in use with wheeled vehicles; roads fit for passage of wheeled artillery; camel tracks; railway lines; telegraph lines and telegraph offices; post offices; boundaries, both demarcated and undemarcated. Also indicated are rivers and waterways; settlements; marshes; and desert regions. The map was printed by the Simla Drawing Office and includes a printing statement which reads ‘D.O.S.I. No. E 6107 10-30.’
